name: Streadata.io API Gallery - Groupon
description: This is a repository of groupon APIs, self-contained as a Github repository, with HTML and YAML representations of the APIs and their surrounding operations.

apis.name: Groupon
apis.description: Register for a Groupon API key (client_id) to develop your own Groupon applications. Now, you can put all those great ideas for Groupon improvements, extensions, and multiple-platform interfaces to work.
